# formatStyle

**Instance Property**

The format style this strategy uses when parsing strings.

## Declaration

```swift
var formatStyle: Format
```

## Accessing strategy properties

- **lenient**: A Boolean value that indicates whether parsing allows any discrepencies in the expected format.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether parsing allows any discrepencies in the expected format.
items.name: lenient
